description: Three oil depot workers who admitted breaching the Isle of Man's Covid-19 rules are fined.
title: Coronavirus: Key workers who bought beer at shop spared jail
title_page: Coronavirus: Key workers who bought beer at shop spared jail - BBC News
maintext: The court heard the men had been given permission to carry out work at a fuel depot in Peel from 28 September to 1 October, and after arriving in Douglas shortly before 18:00 BST they drove to their hotel.
